BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Siting and Maritime Uses

Items.Title: Application no. 20105061 SCR, a proposed site for a new 844 seat Primary School Facility to be located at 1034, 1050 Targee Street (Block 3168, Lot 4, 20 and 195), Council District 50, Borough of Staten Island. This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Landmarks, Primary School Facility to be located at 1034, 1050 Targee St, Staten Island  (20105061SCR)

Items.Title: Application no. 20105081 SCM, a proposed site for a new 630 seat Primary/Intermediate School Facility to be located at 515-533 West 44th Street (Block 1073, Lot 1), Council District 3, Borough of Manhattan . This matter is subject to Council review and action pursuant Section 1732 of the New York State Public Authorities.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee

Items.Title: Application no. 20105061 SCR, a proposed site for a new 844 seat Primary School Facility to be located at 1034, 1050 Targee Street (Block 3168, Lot 4, 20 and 195), Council District 50, Borough of Staten Island.
